name: Block Slider Puzzle Game
description:
Block Slider Puzzle Game is a simple and at the same time challenging game. A popular and relaxing sliding block puzzle game. Just slide the wooden blocks left or right to fill the spaces and clear the line.

Tips: Place blocks wisely; Try to make big combos to get more points!

Choose an exciting Block Slider Puzzle Game! 

- classic block puzzle!

- no time limit! 

- game interface and sounds bring you closer to nature!

- Easy to play and suitable for all ages!

- free and no Wi-Fi needed!

Train your brain with this casual game.

 Enjoy the addictive Block Slider Puzzle Game! The more games, the more interesting.
